Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2009 09:36AM pamer720 wrote: I am talking with my surgeon Mon. about either a lumpectomy or mastectomy and I hope she can schedule it next week.  I just want to get this over with.  I have DCIS stage "0".  Just found out yesterday.  What's your situation? Pam
Posts.Title: January Lumpectomy Lories Lories

Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2009 11:47AM pamer720 wrote: I'm new to this discussion board.  I just happen to see it one day this week while I was trying to find out about some of the things that were said about my spot compression and biopsy.  I found out yesterday that I have DCIS, stage "0".  Will talk to my surgeon Monday about what needs to be done.  I think it will be either a lumpectomy or mastectomy.  I had breast reduction done 4 years ago so hope either one won't be worse than that.  This cluster appeared in a year's time.  I'm alittle amazed at how quick something like this can happen but also thankful it appears to be early.  I've been taking bioidentical hormones for 3 years and wonder if that has anything to do with this.  The dosage is very low, though.  I am 59 and realize that lots of women face this around this age.  I would appreciate any comments or advice on my situation. Thanks, Pam
